description: Our commercial grade Soft Seating range includes: chairs, sofas, tub chairs & ottomans, ideal for any venue or purpose offering outstanding value for money. Combine our soft seating and easy chairs with any of our coffee tables for a complete furnishing solution. Available in a wide range of fabrics and finishes. We have many items that are in stock for quick delivery as well as a huge range of items that are made bespoke. These items are available in your choice of fabrics, fauxs, and leathers. Don't see anything you like? Give us a ring with your requirements and we'll be happy to help! All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
